SUMMARY:
X driver
X.Org X server -- synaptics touchpad input driver
DEPENDS:
virtual/xserver xorgproto util-macros
libxi mtdev libxtst libevdev
xorgproto
DESCRIPTION: synaptics is an Xorg input driver for the touchpads from Synaptics Incorporated. Even though these touchpads (by default, operating in a compatibility mode emulating a standard mouse) can be handled by the normal evdev or mouse drivers, this driver allows more advanced features of the touchpad to become available.
